secureTransaction.title: SECURE YOUR TRANSACTION
secureTransaction.description: Shop and sell with confidence! Protects every transaction with advanced security, keeping your money safe in every step.

flexibleEscrow.title: FLEXIBLE ESCROW
flexibleEscrow.description: Escrow adjusts to your needs, holding funds securely until everyone's happy, making transactions smooth and stress-free.

referAndEarn.title: REFER A FRIEND, EARN REWARDS
referAndEarn.description: Invite your friends to join our trading community, and both you and your friends will receive exclusive benefits.
